text: The [[Seren]] tribe known as the Stormwalkers were founded by a cruel [[blue dragon]]. Although one of the smallest tribes, they are nonetheless dangerous and thus, highly respected. The Stormwalkers developed a martial, [[monastic|monk]] tradition emulating the natural attacks of the [[dragon]], and the greatest masters of this art can extend their lifespans or even temporarily change shape into the form of a dragon.
title: Stormwalkers
